amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Departmental Administration for the Department of Veterans Affairs by $3.2 million and increases funding for Information Technology Systems by a similar amount for use in decreasing the VA claims backlog.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Departmental Administration for the Department of Veterans Affairs by $3,200,000 and increase the Information Technology Systems by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
